content.rendered:
Stay with us and wake up less than an hour away from the trailheads for 7 14'ers and 20+ 13'ers!

Coming from Mexico or Canada? Take a zero day here and have every amenity nearby!

Nearby Trails

We are located just north of the large body of water (the Dillon Reservoir.)

Hiking the Colorado Trail/Continental Divide Trail?

We are best accessed from the CT/CDT’s crossing of CO-9 at Revette Drive, and it is possible to take FREE public transit all the way to the hostel via the SummitStage bus. From Revette Dr:

  • Board a purple Frisco-bound bus to the end (Frisco Station)
  • Board a red Silverthorne bus, take it to the end (Silverthorne Station)
  • Board a blue Keystone bus and get off at Dillon Valley East

BUT if you’d rather not, Uber/Lyft are available.

Loaner bikes are available for transportation around the area.

Stay With Us
